entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Regina
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:58 AM CST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -6.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Regina Int'l Airport 01:31 AM CST Sunday 15 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -6.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -8.3°C
Wind: NW 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog developing after midnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 12:59 AM CST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Fog dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 12:59 AM CST Sunday 15 January 2023
